title: Applying the Commutative Property
text: Use the Commutative Property of addition to reorder so that like terms are together: $$negneg}\left(22p\right)+\operatorname{negneg}\left(35p\right)+17q+\operatorname{\left(-27q\right)$$

title: Simplifying the Expression
text: What is the simplified expression once like terms are added?
